diff.author: Kamf
diff.description: patient_phone keeps phone numbers of patients; primary key/foreign key - patient_id references person_name_id in already created openmrs table person_name | patient_id | phone_provider_name | phone_number | receive_notifications |
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'patient_phone' ( 'patient_id' int(10) NOT NULL, 'phone_provider_name' varchar(255), 'phone_number' int(10), 'receive_notifications' int(1), PRIMARY KEY ('patient_id'), FOREIGN KEY ('patient_id') REFERENCES 'person_name' ('person_name_id') ) ENGINE=InnoDBDEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
